casebody.data:
In the Matter of Israel FEIT, Bankrupt, Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 14, 1923.) No. 150. Kopp, Markewieh & Perlman, of New York City (L. H. Sapor, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Jacobson & Pollock, of New York City (Alexander Aaronson and Henry W. Pollock, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
